attributes.action: Use the full powers of his office to ensure that Channel Four, a publicly owned company mandated to provide public service broadcasting, does not continue to profit from the racist bullying currently taking place on Celebrity Big Brother.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Housemate Shilpa Shetty has been repeadetdly verbally abused by fellow housemates Jade Goodie, Jackiey Budden, Jack Tweedy, Jo O'Meara and Danielle Lloyd, slurs based on her Asian ethnicity and Indian nationality. Channel Four will see their profits from the show increase greatly when Goodie and Shetty go head-to-head in a public vote. Profiting from racism, in any situation, is not acceptable.
